title: When the Whistle Blows
description: A sitcom about the everyday lives of the workers at a Wigan factory dealing with their obnoxious boss, Ray Stokes.
altHero: Andy Millman as Ray Stokes, an awkward man with curly hair and large-framed, red glasses
alt1: the employees of the factory sit at a table in the break room
alt2: Millman looks embarrassed with a Japanese business man
alt3: the employees chatting in the break room
alt4: Chris Martin from Coldplay stops by, wearing one of the factory jumpsuits
